title: Dead Eye Will
description: William Riddle, at the age of thirteen, quickly earned the moniker of 'Dead Eye' in the War of 1812. Saving his regiment from an ambush by a long distance shot that killed an Indian chief and alerted the troops to their danger, he was instantly a hero.Rising to Lieutenant, Will retired from the army at war's end, but was soon to be serving as a special agent for Governor William Cass. A service that proved to be quite dangerous.But it wasn't until he trusted Christ that he became an American hero. His faith would be tested and only God knew how strong a faith Will would need. It is the author's plan that this be the first in a series to be called An American Hero.
author: R. Frederick Riddle
